TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Lonny_Baxter, title = Lonny_Baxter, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lonny_Baxter} }

S.FORM: Lonny Baxter sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1979, ryax sa tay 27 nqu tay 1, Lonny Baxter, squliq na p'unro.
